data.text: By 2050, one in every four people in the world will live in Africa — and so we're working with the UN to launch the Global Africa Business Initiative #GABI in support of the continent's economic growth. #NextBillionUsers Learn more ↓ https://t.co/tx97FFcHMw

urls.title: Home | Global Africa Business Initiative
urls.description: The Global Africa Business Initiative (GABI) is designed to highlight investment opportunities in Africa where every sector of the economy is on a growth trajectory. GABI will bring together the leading business minds from Africa and rest of the world to discuss how Africa is seizing the moment.
